vstore.framework.db.table_helper

Class RulesDBHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • vstore.framework.db.table_helper.RulesDBHelper

  • public class RulesDBHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper for handling database requests for decision rules. Inside it also handles the join with the decision layer and mimetype tables.

    • Field Summary

    • Method Detail

      • insertRule

        public static void insertRule(VStoreRule rule)
                       throws java.sql.SQLException
        Inserts the given decision rule into the local sqlite database. Will simply update an entry, if the given id is already in the database.
        Parameters:
        rule - The rule.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - in case of a database error.

      • updateRule

        public static void updateRule(VStoreRule rule)
                       throws java.sql.SQLException
        Updates the decision rule entry in the database to the state of the rule given as parameter.
        Parameters:
        rule - The rule object containing the updated information to be saved to the internal database.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - in case of a database error.

      • getRule

        public static VStoreRule getRule(java.lang.String uuid)
                          throws java.sql.SQLException
        Reads a decision rule from the local sqlite database.
        Parameters:
        uuid - The UUID of the rule to read from the database.
        Returns:
        A VStoreRule object.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - in case of a database error.

      • getRules

        public static java.util.List<VStoreRule> getRules(java.lang.String ordering)
                                           throws java.sql.SQLException
        Returns a list of the decision rules currently in the local database.
        Parameters:
        ordering - The ordering of the rule list. Should be either SORT_BY_DATE_DESCENDING, or SORT_BY_DATE_ASCENDING or SORT_BY_NAME_DESCENDING.
        Returns:
        A list containing the VStoreRule decision rules.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - in case of a database error.

      • getMimetypesForRule

        private static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getMimetypesForRule(java.lang.String ruleId)
                                                             throws java.sql.SQLException
        Returns a list of mime types that correspond to this rule from the database.
        Parameters:
        ruleId - The rule id for which to get the mime types.
        Returns:
        The list with the mime type strings.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - in case of a database error.

      • getDecisionLayersForRule

        private static java.util.List<DecisionLayer> getDecisionLayersForRule(java.lang.String ruleId)
                                                               throws java.sql.SQLException
        Returns a list of decision layers that correspond to this rule from the database.
        Parameters:
        ruleId - The rule id for which to get decision layers.
        Returns:
        The list with the decision layers.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - in case of a database error.

      • getRulesMatchingFileType

        public static java.util.List<VStoreRule> getRulesMatchingFileType(java.lang.String mimetype)
                                                           throws java.sql.SQLException
        Gets all rules from the database that have the given mimetype configured.
        Parameters:
        mimetype - The mimetype to fetch rules for.
        Returns:
        A list of all matched rules.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - in case of a database error.

      • q

        private static java.lang.String q(boolean q)
        Workaround for simplifying the sql field list
        Parameters:
        q - True, if a questionmark should be included in the list (for prepared statements)
        Returns:
        True: " = ?, " False: ", "
